com.absio.crypto.ecc

Class ECKeyDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.absio.crypto.ecc.ECKeyDecoder

  • public class ECKeyDecoder
extends Object
    This class is used for decoding elliptic curve private keys from PEM or PKCS format and elliptic curve public keys from PEM or X509 format.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ECKeyDecoder()
      Create an elliptic curve key decoder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ECPrivateKey getPrivateKeyFromPEM(String key)
      Decode the PEM encoded elliptic curve private key into an ECPrivateKey.
      ECPrivateKey getPrivateKeyFromPKCS8(byte[] key)
      Decode the PKCS8 encoded elliptic curve private key into an ECPrivateKey.
      ECPublicKey getPublicKeyFromPEM(String key)
      Decode the PEM encoded elliptic curve public key into an ECPublicKey.
      ECPublicKey getPublicKeyFromX509(byte[] key)
      Decode the X509 encoded elliptic curve public key into an ECPublicKey.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ECKeyDecoder

        public ECKeyDecoder()
             throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Create an elliptic curve key decoder.
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown if EC keys are not supported

    • Method Detail

      • getPrivateKeyFromPEM

        public ECPrivateKey getPrivateKeyFromPEM(String key)
                                  throws IOException,
                                         InvalidKeySpecException
        Decode the PEM encoded elliptic curve private key into an ECPrivateKey.
        Parameters:
        key - the PEM encoded elliptic curve private key
        Returns:
        the ECPrivateKey
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if there is an IO issue processing the encoded key
        InvalidKeySpecException - thrown is the key is not the expected format and specification

        Decode the PKCS8 encoded elliptic curve private key into an ECPrivateKey.

        Returns:
        the ECPrivateKey
        Throws:
        InvalidKeySpecException - thrown is the key is not the expected format and specification

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the ECPublicKey
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if there is an IO issue processing the encoded key
